promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong lynx electric-type pokemon wearing a yellow and teal crystal headband. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltanix, a a massive strong lynx electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Electroblast. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "electric" or "Voltanix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, lynx-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Harnessing surges of urban energy, this formidable feline radiates with Electroblast power, prowling rooftops as the city's electrifying guardian.
